title: EMI Shielding
description: SRP has been providing custom converted EMI Shielding gaskets and seals to various industries since 1951. We exceed customer expectations through exceptional customer service, quality manufacturing, competitive pricing and on-time delivery. EMI Shielding gaskets and seals can be custom fabricated to your exact specifications and requirements.
content: SRP has been providing custom converted EMI Shielding gaskets and seals to various industries since 1951. We exceed customer expectations through exceptional customer service, quality manufacturing, competitive pricing and on-time delivery. EMI Shielding gaskets and seals can be custom fabricated to your exact specifications and requirements.

seo.title: EMI Shielding
seo.description: SRP has been providing custom converted EMI Shielding gaskets and seals to various industries since 1951. We exceed customer expectations through exceptional customer service, quality manufacturing, competitive pricing and on-time delivery. EMI Shielding gaskets and seals can be custom fabricated to your exact specifications and requirements.

blocks.title: Benefits
blocks.content:
• Voltage Endurance
  • Thermal Conductivity
  • Excellent dielectric strength shields against electrical surges
  • Mechanical Toughness

blocks.title: Common EMI Shielding Gasket Materials
blocks.content:
• 3M ThermaVolt Insulation Paper
  • BISCO EC-2130 Silicone EMI Shields
  • Nomex Type 410
  • Formex Polypropylene
  • SSP EMI / RFI Conductive Silicones

blocks.title: Applications
blocks.content:
• EMI Shielding
  • Appliance Controls
  • Electronic Devices
  • Automotive Controls
  • Electrical Insulation
  • Circuit Breakers
